description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in Windows kernel (CVE-2024-26174), apply the relevant security updates:

1. Identify the appropriate KB Articles for your system version:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64: Install update KB5035853.
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64: Install update KB5035845.
   - Windows Server 2022: Install update KB5035856.
2. Download the updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - KB5035853: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
   - KB5035845: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
3. Restart your system after the installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates address the information disclosure risk by restricting access to sensitive information in the Windows kernel.
- Make sure your system is updated to the respective build numbers for the updates to apply correctly:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: Build 10.0.22631.3296.
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: Build 10.0.19045.4170.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows versions.
- Backup any critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
